Class FileMenuHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileMenuHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class FileMenuHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    FileMenuHandler class which sets up JFileChooser and reads the file
    Author:
    Hammad Ahmad

        Reads words from file, separates them and only stores them if they are words that contain only 3 letters and no numbers.
        Parameters:

        unsorted - unsorted list of words
        sorted - sorted list of words

      • isLegalWord

        public static boolean isLegalWord(java.lang.String word)
        Will check the string for whether or not it contains all letters or some numbers.
        Parameters:
        word - String that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if all characters in the word are letters, false otherwise.
